I20070321-1600

* Opened the "add exception breakpoint dialog"
* typed some filter text
* before the search is compelte, edited the filter text
* kept doing this... eventually NPE'd

> we return null from AddExceptionDialog.getElementName(Object), but the abstract method does not allow for null. We should return the empty string when we can't find a name for the element.

*** Bug 178969 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=61813)
patch

This patch is more type safe than the patch in the dup. We know that only IType's are passed into the content provider in the DebugTypeSelectionDialog.
Is this a regression introduced during M6 ? It is *really* late for M6 inclusion.
